title: BioFrontiers High Performance Shared Equipment Core Facilities Fund
description: This fund supports the greatest needs of BioFrontiers' shared equipment Core Facilities, including updating and acquiring emerging technology for scientific computation, microscopy, and next generation sequencing.
marketingContent: This fund supports the greatest needs of BioFrontiers' shared equipment Core Facilities, including updating and acquiring emerging technology for scientific computation, microscopy, and next generation sequencing.
